did.unittitle: Howard Bishop Lewis pamphlets and reprints 1912-1953, undated
did.abstract: Professor of Biological Chemistry and dean of the College of Pharmacy at the University of Michigan.; reprints of scientific articles in areas or biochemistry.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The material was assembled from a number of sources.

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright status of individual articles varies.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Howard Bishop Lewis pamphlets and reprints, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Professor of Biological Chemistry and chairman of the department and Dean of the College of Pharmacy at the University of Michigan.

scopecontent.p: The Howard Bishop Lewis pamphlets and reprints collection consists of reprints of scientific articles, many having to do with metabolism and amino acids and the role of proteins in nutrition.

did.unittitle: Pamphlets and Reprints.

The influence of inulin on the output of glucose in phlorhizin diabetes.

Changes in the urea content of blood and tissues of guinea pigs maintained on an exclusive oat diet.

A study of the normal metabolism of the guinea pig.

Studies in uric acid metabolism: I. The influence of high protein diets on the endogenous uric acid elimination.
Studies in uric acid metabolism: II. Proteins and amino-acids as factors in the stimulation of endogenous uric acid metabolism.

Amino-acid synthesis in the animal organism. Can nor-leucine replace lysine for the nutritive requirements of the white rat?

The metabolism of sulfur: V. Cysteine as an intermediary product in the metabolism of cystine.

Studies in uric acid metabolism: III. The influence of fats and carbohydrates on the endogenous uric acid elimination.

Amino acid synthesis in the animal organism: The availability of some caproic acid derivatives for the synthesis of lysine.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Bentley Library's also has personal manuscript collection of professor Lewis. See: Howard B. Lewis papers, 1922-1954. His work as dean of the College of Pharmacy is also a record group. See: College of Pharmacy (University of Michigan) records, 1868-1994
